GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object, nested with a key of article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an an array of comments for a given article, nested with a key of comments

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: Posts a comment object containing username and body, and serves the posted comment with all properties

postedComment.body: the body of the new comment
postedComment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Patches a given article object, by sending an incriment to the votes, and serves the patched article with the votes incrimented

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a given comment object, and serves a 204 only

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
